page.shortlink: api client api a5 chart mapped data object
page.description: The mapping of raw data into a format useable by the charting logic.

property.name: groups
property.description: The groups created from the mapped data. See *[link:A5.chart Mapped Data Group Object]*.

property.name: dimensions
property.description: An array of the dimensions of the mapped data. See *[link:A5.chart Mapped Dimension Object]*.
